experiences.title: Full-Stack Software Developer III (Team ACA)
experiences.subtitle: Paycom
workDescription: Built a dynamic Full-Stack import service allowing employers to bulk upload and seelctively import ACA data (series codes, payroll profiles, zip codes, share costs, etc.) automatically updating employee data calculations across services. Allowing for very large files to be uploaded and reduction in customer support work as clients could now upload their own data
Migrated legacy PHP/HTML pages to React + TypeScript, improving performance, maintainability, and user experience while integrating with existing backend APIs.

Improved ACA data accuracy and reduced specialist workload by developing support for multiple employment periods per employee across ACA services. Each period is calculated with unique ACA data for the employee to support accuracy. This allowed our clients to take control over their data and rely less on our customer support agents

Implemented a new Federal Poverty Level (FPL) affordability calculation option clients could choose, ensuring ACA compliance and accuracy across payroll and benefits services for all clients. Since it was compliance had to meet strict deadlines while maintaining quality of code.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Paycom
workDescription: Implemented the ability for users to share their screen with a customer service employee from Paycom’s client web pages
Added a recording option to save webpage sharing sessions to Paycom’s servers
Managed the SQL database for our project and implemented SQL queries to the backend server

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Favor
workDescription: Reduced Favor’s response time through the addition of ETag headers and Cache-Control Headers via middleware and a new response interface that is used widely on all core services. This was most ran code at Favor getting hit 30 million times a day
Worked with large datasets to group users based on value to the company and implemented this cohosting in marketing tools
Implemented custom events and listeners and published these events to marketing tools
Fixed vulnerabilities in services to prevent outages
